name: MOLLY'S MOD (ver 1.0)
description:
Welcome to  Molly's Mod, an online multiplayer sandbox experience! 

CONTROLS:

1. W,A,S,D or Arrow keys to walk

2.  Click on stuff with your mouse pointer!

Special thanks to Spencer Glenn for the bangin' soundtrack!

Check out his other music here:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCYPYrwquCgSPkJLX5BmQLw
